subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Clippers’ Blake Griffin used a choir and a ball tossed from the driver’s seat of a Kia to win the N.B.A. All-Star weekend’s slam-dunk contest.
snippet: The Clippers’ Blake Griffin used a choir and a ball tossed from the driver’s seat of a Kia to win the N.B.A. All-Star weekend’s slam-dunk contest.
